question: [File: aptos-core/crates/indexer/src/models/token_models/v2_token_datas.rs] [Function: get_by_token_data_id()] [SQL Injection] Does the raw SQL query at line 256 properly sanitize the 'address' parameter, or can an attacker inject malicious SQL through crafted token_data_id values to extract unauthorized data or manipulate the database? (Critical)
